This is a common tip.Depending on individual residential conditions, there may be some differences.
Electricity Energysaving Tips

Water Energysaving Tips
Warm Water Energysaving Tips
Heating Energysaving Tips
Tips for making indoor condition
Indoor condition tips
To save electricity when cleaning
Please empty the vacuum cleaner filter frequently! \nWhen the filter is full, more electricity will be used even if you clean the same area.
To save electricity when doing the laundry
Washing with cold water to try to save electricity! \nDuring laundry, 90% of the energy is used when heating the water. The differences are minor.
Main consumer of electricity, TV Settop Box
Pull the plug out of settop box when you do not watch TV! \nIt is one of main consumer of electricity and consumes 17kWh per hour even if you do not watch TV.
When you use the airconditioner
Using also the fan! \nThe fan makes the air cool quickly circulating the air from the airconditioner.
Saving gas adjusting the heat
Using gas stove, adjust the heat not to exceed out of the pot! \nIf the gas flame is too high, more gas is consumed leaking gas unnecessarily.
Saving water when wasing the dishes
Wash the dishes with spray mode of the faucet! \nYou can finish dish washing more quickly saving the water.
To save warm water in daily lives
Save warm water by shortening shower time! \nTo heat warm water, most gas is consumed. And most warm water is used during shower.
To save gas through using the boiler
Set the boiler temprature to 20℃, recommendable heating temprature in winter. \nYou can save 7% per 1℃.
Reducing moisture by heating the floor
When it is humid, mold tends to reproduce easily on the cold floor. \nGet rid of the humidity by heating the floor for some time.
Ventilating the bathroom
When it is humid, mold tends to reproduce easily in the bathroom \nwhere the temperature is low relatively.
Preventing condensation
High probability of condensation on the external wall through temperature difference. Ventilate for some time after turning off the boiler. \nIt can reduce temperature difference and humidity.
To keep optimal humidity without humidifier
When there is no humidifier, boil the water without cover to raise humidity. \nHanging out the wet towel in the room also helps to keep the humidity.
